net.demilich.metastone.game.actions

Enum ActionType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ActionType>
      • net.demilich.metastone.game.actions.ActionType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ActionType>

    public enum ActionType
extends java.lang.Enum<ActionType>
    Action types correspond to things the player can do. They can be used in TargetAcquisitionTrigger to perform effects when players do certain targeting actions.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BATTLECRY
      Indicates the action is a battlecry.
      DISCOVER
      Indicates the action is to discover among choices.
      END_TURN
      Indicates the action ends the turn.
      EQUIP_WEAPON
      Indicates the action resulted in equipping a weapon.
      HERO
      Indicates the action is playing a hero card, replacing the current hero.
      HERO_POWER
      Indicates the action is to use a hero power, possibly with a target.
      PHYSICAL_ATTACK
      Indicates the action is an attack of one Actor against another.
      SPELL
      Indicates the action is casting a spell, possibly with a target.
      SUMMON
      Indicates the action is summoning a minion, possibly with a minion targeted to summon it "next to."
      SYSTEM
      Indicates the action isn't player-initiated and is of a special system type.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • SYSTEM

        public static final ActionType SYSTEM
        Indicates the action isn't player-initiated and is of a special system type. Currently unused.

      • END_TURN

        public static final ActionType END_TURN
        Indicates the action ends the turn.

      • PHYSICAL_ATTACK

        public static final ActionType PHYSICAL_ATTACK
        Indicates the action is an attack of one Actor against another.

      • SPELL

        public static final ActionType SPELL
        Indicates the action is casting a spell, possibly with a target.

      • SUMMON

        public static final ActionType SUMMON
        Indicates the action is summoning a minion, possibly with a minion targeted to summon it "next to."

      • HERO_POWER

        public static final ActionType HERO_POWER
        Indicates the action is to use a hero power, possibly with a target.

      • BATTLECRY

        public static final ActionType BATTLECRY
        Indicates the action is a battlecry. When not targeted, the battlecry action is executed automatically.

      • EQUIP_WEAPON

        public static final ActionType EQUIP_WEAPON
        Indicates the action resulted in equipping a weapon.

      • DISCOVER

        public static final ActionType DISCOVER
        Indicates the action is to discover among choices.

      • HERO

        public static final ActionType HERO
        Indicates the action is playing a hero card, replacing the current hero.
